abstract: Internet providers are turning more to deep packet inspection, a technology that can raise prices on those downloading big files at peak times.
snippet: Internet providers are turning more to deep packet inspection, a technology that can raise prices on those downloading big files at peak times.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:07 p.m.  Details of the Cox and Comcast approaches modified.

headline.main: The Economics of Snooping on Internet Traffic
